meanings.sent1: After a long search, she finally resights her lost keys on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: He resights the beautiful sunset every evening from his balcony.
meanings.sent3: The detective resights the crime scene, hoping to find new clues.
meanings.sent4: She resights her favorite childhood book, bringing back memories of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The artist resights the landscape, capturing its beauty on canvas.

meanings.definition: The act of seeing again or anew.
meanings.sent1: The resights of familiar landmarks brought back memories of past vacations.
meanings.sent2: His resights of the old photographs sparked a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent3: The museum offers visitors resights of ancient artifacts through virtual reality.
meanings.sent4: The resights of the city skyline from the hilltop were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The resights of the starry night sky filled her with wonder and awe.
